title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for d V d t = k r

1 point is earned for d V d t = 4 π r 2 d r d t

1 point is earned for separates variables

1 point is earned for integration (must have C)

1 point is earned for solving for C

1 point is earned for solving for k

1 point is earned for answer

d V d t = k r d V d t = 4 π r 2 d r d t k r = 4 π r 2 d r d t k d t = 4 π r 3 d r k t + C = π r 4 At   t = 0 , r = 1   so   C = π At   t = 15 , r = 2 , so   15 k + π = 16 π , k = π π r 4 = π t + π r = t + 1 4
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for d V d t = k r

1 point is earned for d V d t = 4 π r 2 d r d t

1 point is earned for separates variables

1 point is earned for integration (must have C)

1 point is earned for solving for C

1 point is earned for solving for k

1 point is earned for answer

d V d t = k r d V d t = 4 π r 2 d r d t k r = 4 π r 2 d r d t k d t = 4 π r 3 d r k t + C = π r 4 At   t = 0 , r = 1   so   C = π At   t = 15 , r = 2 , so   15 k + π = 16 π , k = π π r 4 = π t + π r = t + 1 4
